mapper.select: SELECT id, name, category_id, price, original_price, stock, sales, cover_image, images, description, specs, status, is_hot, is_recommend, deleted, created_time, updated_time FROM `product` WHERE deleted = 0 AND status = 1 AND is_hot = 1 ORDER BY sales DESC LIMIT #{limit}
